name: O Chef
description:
A simple arcade game about delivering the right order to your clients.

-Some ingredients need to be baked or warm up before.

  +   =  

-Others are ready to consume. 

     

-Do you pick a wrong ingredient ? Use the trash bin quickly !

-Use WASD, arrow keys or left analog stick to walk.

-To interact with scenario use spacebar-bar or (A)Button

-You can press M or (Y)Button to mute/unmute the voice of characters.

Voices by:

Elizangela

Nery

Ana

Game over jingle by Unfa : https://freesound.org/people/unfa/sounds/181352/
